title: The Insurance story
creator_credit: Eric L. Morris, Geoffrey Thompson and Cine Service
brief_description: Traces the history of insurance, origin of “underwriting”, and looks at the many fields in which insurance is available. Shows the work of a typical insurance office and the procedure following a claim. Narrated by Geoff McComas.
creator_credit_for_label: Eric L. Morris, Geoffrey Thompson and Cine Service
